statements: DELETE FROM medication_inventory WHERE id = 1 AND medication_name = 'Aspirin';
DELETE FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31' AND quantity <= 10;
DELETE FROM Medications WHERE id = 1 AND name = 'Paracetamol';

DELETE FROM restocking WHERE restock_quantity >= 50 AND restock_date < '2022-01-01';
